input_text:
Job Title: Bilingual English/Spanish Cashier

Location: Houston, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Education, Training

Description:
About Us:

EMR is one of the worldâ€™s leading metal recycling companies with a history spanning decades. At EMR, our employees are the heart and soul of our organization. We are committed to creating a workplace that prioritizes the well-being and safety of everyone. Our company provides a supportive and inclusive community where everyone's ideas and contributions are valued. We believe in teamwork and collaboration.

Our mission is to provide our customers with efficient and reliable metal recycling services while minimizing the environmental impact of our operations. EMR recycles ten million tons of material annually, everything from beverage cans to aircraft carriers. We work with a wide variety of metals including copper, aluminum, brass, and stainless steel and can recycle it into more than 200 different types of new sustainable raw materials.

EMR offers our team a competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement plans with company match, wellbeing benefits, employee assistance program and more. Join us and be a part of a team that puts people first!

Summary

EMR USA has an opening for an Bilingual English/Spanish Cashier in Houston, Texas. The Cashier will be responsible for paying out tickets. To be successful, the Cashier must have computer experience and be able to maintain accurate records. Ultimately, an outstanding Cashier has great customer service and organizational skills.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

Pay out customer tickets Maintain accurate accounting of all cash and check balances. Provide excellent customer service to all dealers, vendors & customers. Input all transaction data into manufacturing software. Maintain all associated files related to transactions. Performs other duties as assigned. 

Required Skills / Abilities

Ability to work independently as well as within a team environment Personal computer experience. Customer service skills. Ability to communicate effectively in both spoken and written formAbility to pass a criminal background check, physical, and drug screening 

Education & Experience

High school diploma or GED 2 years experience in customer service 

Other Job Demands

While performing the essential functions of this job, the Cashier will be working in an office environment. The Cashier will be required to operate a computer and other office devices such as telephones, copy machines, etc. The employee is required to sit, stand, and walk for long periods of time. This job also requires frequent bending, kneeling, and standing, lifting up to 50 lbs., and working in confined spaces.

EMR USA Metal Recycling provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

E-Verify is a registered trademark of the U.S. Department of Homeland Security. This business uses E-Verify in its hiring practices to achieve lawful workforce. 

Apply Now

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

They prioritize employee well-being and safety, offering a supportive and inclusive workplace. EMR recycles ten million tons of material annually, including various metals and can recycle them into over 200 sustainable raw materials.
